text: Rulx Léon (Les Cayes, December 2, 1890 - 1984)Revue de la Société haïtienne d'histoire et de géographie, Issues 142-149 - Page 5, Société haïtienne d'histoire et de géographie, 1984 was a Haitian physician, historian, and journalist. Doctor Léon was "one of the most respected Haitian scholars."P. Schutt-Ainé, Haiti: A Basic Reference Book, 104 He was the author of a documentary on the history of Haiti entitled Propos d'Histoire d'Haïti (1945/1974). ==Notes== ==References== * Category:1890 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Haitian historians Category:Haitian male writers Category:Haitian journalists Category:Haitian physicians Category:20th-century historians Category:20th-century male writers Category:20th-century journalists
title: Rulx Léon
